title: Why Statistics?
text:
Welcome to our class.
Hi! I’m your professor. My name is Arman Daniel Catterson, and thank you for reading these words that I wrote! Below is a short video so you can see what I look and sound like.
This textbook will also be part of the flipped classroom approach that we will take this semester.
The flipped classroom approach requires y’all to do the readings and watch the videos before class.
The flipped classroom approach also requires me to write text and record videos that are engaging and helpful for the three main parts of this class.
crumbs: Why Statistics, Research Methods, and R?
